successes.title: Elliott Landy's Photographs of THE BAND— The Book
successes.description: A Fine-Art photography book of Elliott Landy's photographs of THE BAND—featuring both his iconic and never-before-seen images.

Pledges.description: Level 1.  5x7" folded THANK-YOU CARD including a photograph of The Band, signed by Elliott (shown in "Rewards").  Everyone who pledges $25 or more will receive this card.
Level 2. Signed REGULAR EDITION book.  Plus  5x7" CARD.
Level 2A.  This is the same as Level 2, except you will get TWO of each. Two Signed REGULAR EDITION books. Plus two 5x7" CARDS.
Level 3. Signed REGULAR EDITION book.  Plus a signed 16x22” LITHO.  Choose LITHO 1 or LITHO 2 (shown in "Rewards"). Plus 5x7" CARD.
Level 4.  Signed REGULAR EDITION book.  Plus CAPITOL RECORDS POSTER of The Band signed by Elliott.  Numbered from a total of 100 (shown in "Rewards").  Plus 5x7" CARD.

Level 5.  DELUXE LIMITED EDITION book.  All Deluxe Limited Edition books are signed and numbered and include a signed 8x10” Fine Art Pigment Ink Print (shown in "Book Specs").  Plus DONOR'S NAME will be included in the acknowledgements section of the book. Plus 5x7" CARD.
Level 6. The same as previous level plus CAPITOL RECORDS POSTER (shown in "Rewards").

Level 5A. This is the same as Level 5, except you will get TWO of each.  Two DELUXE LIMITED EDITION books. Plus two DONOR NAMES included in the acknowledgements section of the book. Plus two 5x7" CARDS.

Level 7.  DELUXE LIMITED EDITION book.  Plus a signed 16 x 20" FINE ART PIGMENT INK PRINT.  Choose from PRINTS A, B, C, or D (shown in "Rewards").  Plus DONOR'S NAME in acknowledgements.  Plus 5x7" CARD.
Level 8.  The same as the previous level with an 18 x 24" print instead of a 16 x 20".

Level 9.  DELUXE LIMITED EDITION book.  Plus a Limited Edition signed 20 x 24" SILVER GELATIN PRINT.  Choose from PRINTS B,C,D, or E, which has never been printed before (shown in "Rewards").  Plus DONOR'S NAME in the acknowledgements.  Plus 5x7" CARD.

Level 10.  DELUXE LIMITED EDITION book.  Plus a Limited Edition signed 20 x 24" SEPIA SILVER GELATIN PRINT of the Big Pink Album photograph.  (Shown in "Rewards".)  Plus DONOR'S NAME in the acknowledgements.  Plus 5x7" CARD.
Level 11.  Everything from the above level PLUS THREE Limited Edition signed 20 x 24" SILVER GELATIN PRINTS.  Choose from PRINTS B,C,D, or E (shown in "Rewards").  International shipping is free.

Level 12.   An afternoon visit for two adults to Elliott’s studio in Woodstock, NY.  Includes lunch with Elliott in his home and a tour of his archives.  Plus a five minute drive down the road to Big Pink (we may or may not be able to go inside).  Plus TWO DELUXE LIMITED EDITION books.  Plus TWO signed 18 x 24” FINE ART PIGMENT INK PRINTS of your choice to be selected from Elliott's archive at the studio.  Plus DONORS' NAMES in the acknowledgements.  Plus TWO 5x7" CARDS.
